scripts.build-js: browserify -t reactify -x ./src/api.js src/bootstrap.js | uglifyjs > build/build.js && bash update-version-number.sh && node_modules/.bin/node-sass --output build --output-style compressed css/layout.scss
scripts.watch-js: watchify -t reactify -x ./src/api.js src/bootstrap.js -o build/build.js -dv & node_modules/.bin/node-sass --watch -r --output build --source-map true css
